div.p: We would like to thank the following individuals who volunteered their time and talents to facilitate and/or take notes during the World Caf√© discussions: Marissa Baker, Brianne Duncan, Rico Gonzalez, Nathaniel Matthews-Trigg, Esther Min, Crystal Raymond, Rachel M. Shaffer, Orly Stampfer, Jill Stoddard Tepe, and Darcy Widmayer. We would also like to thank the symposium presenters and participants. We would like to thank our generous sponsors who made this symposium possible: University of Washington Collaborative on Extreme Event Resilience, University of Washington Program on Climate Change, University of Washington Interdisciplinary Center for Exposures, Diseases, Genomics & the Environment, University of Washington Center for Health and the Global Environment, University of Washington Climate Impacts Group, and the Northwest Climate Adaptation Science Center.
